com.microsoft.azure.sdk.iot.deps.serializer

Class TwinProperty

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.azure.sdk.iot.deps.serializer.TwinProperty

  • public class TwinProperty
extends Object
    INNER TWIN CLASS TwinProperty is a representation of the device twin property database. It can represent `Desired` property as well `Reported` property.
